thread.title: River String Festival, river clean-up event set for Saturday in Center Point
thread.title_full: River String Festival, river clean-up event set for Saturday in Center Point

author: Shelby Ligon
title: River String Festival, river clean-up event set for Saturday in Center Point
text:
CENTER POINT â€” Central Provisions and Lions Park Dam will host a River String Festival from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Saturday, March 15.
The festival will be in conjunction with an East Kerr River Clean Up and The Guadalupe Dart 3K Paddle Race.
